pkgmetadata.longdescription: Indices for Single-Case Research // Parametric and nonparametric statistics for single-case design. Regarding nonparametric statistics, the index suggested by Parker, Vannest, Davis and Sauber (2011) doi:10.1016/j.beth.2010.08.006 was included. It combines both nonoverlap and trend to estimate the effect size of a treatment in a single case design.
